TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit RemoteControlClient extends Java.Lang.Object

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Obsolete("This class is obsoleted in this android platform")

Docs.summary: RemoteControlClient enables exposing information meant to be consumed by remote controls capable of displaying metadata, artwork and media transport control buttons.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.param: The current playback state, one of the following values: , , , , , , , , .

MemberSignature.Value: public virtual void SetPlaybackState (Android.Media.RemoteControlPlayState state, long timeInMs, float playbackSpeed);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void SetPlaybackState(valuetype Android.Media.RemoteControlPlayState state, int64 timeInMs, float32 playbackSpeed) cil managed
abstract member SetPlaybackState : Android.Media.RemoteControlPlayState * int64 * single -> unit override this.SetPlaybackState : Android.Media.RemoteControlPlayState * int64 * single -> unit

Docs.param: The current playback state, one of the following values: , , , , , , , , .

a 0 or positive value for the current media position expressed in ms (same unit as for when sending the media duration, if applicable, with in the ). Negative values imply that position is not known (e.g. listening to a live stream of a radio) or not applicable (e.g. when state is and nothing had played yet).
a value expressed as a ratio of 1x playback: 1.0f is normal playback, 2.0f is 2x, 0.5f is half-speed, -2.0f is rewind at 2x speed. 0.0f means nothing is playing (e.g. when state is ).
Docs.summary: Sets the current playback state and the matching media position for the current playback speed.

remarks.para: Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.
